embed.title: How to Uninstall Voicemeeter
embed.description:
Uninstall Voicemeeter by typing “Add or Remove” into the windows search bar.

Then when you’re in the area you can see all the apps you can uninstall, find “Voicemeeter Virtual mixing Console” Click on it and press “Uninstall”.
After uninstalling it, please reboot your pc.

**IF this hasn’t worked**, do the same steps but don’t restart just yet. Go to device manager and find “Sound, video and game controllers” and uninstall the left over “Voicemeeter” drivers (Not virtual cables). (https://i.imgur.com/oWM5KSn.gif)
Then restart.
